content: Future venue in Marina Bay, Singapore **NS Square** is a future outdoor multi-purpose venue in the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core) area of [Marina Bay](/wiki/Marina_Bay,_Singapore), Singapore, designed by local architectural firm [WOHA](/wiki/WOHA), in collaboration with design firm, [Populous](/wiki/Populous_(company)). NS Square will occupy the former site of [The Float@Marina Bay](/wiki/The_Float_@_Marina_Bay). It was first conceptualised in January 2020 to be a permanent replacement of the existing temporary floating platform. Construction of NS Square has started in March 2024, with completion expected in 2027. Along with a 30,000-seat grandstand, NS Square will house a National Service-themed gallery, community sports facilities and a public waterfront promenade. - [Padang, Singapore](/wiki/Padang,_Singapore), historic place for the events of national importance in Singapore - [Farrer Park Field](/wiki/Farrer_Park_Field), another historic place for the events of national importance in Singapore - [Singapore National Day parade](/wiki/Singapore_National_Day_parade)
title: NS Square
